metadata.Title: CVE-2017-2930 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Adobe Flash Player versions 24.0.0.186 and earlier have an exploitable memory corruption vulnerability due to a concurrency error when manipulating a display list. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-2930` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 24.0.0.194ubuntu0.16.04.1
flashplugin-installer - 24.0.0.194ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '24.0.0.194ubuntu0.16.04.1').
